short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your time by seeing the recently uploaded videos by default on the YouTube home page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will save your time by showing recently uploaded videos by default, when opening the YouTube home page.
Normally you would have to find and click the "Recently uploaded" button manually.
long.sk: Show recently uploaded videos when opening the YouTube home page by default
